Objective: Exploit substrate micro-paths (SPEF-level) to sustain fractional power >10 ns.
RequiredEquipment: SPEF tools, EM simulation, Microprobing station, TEM microscopy
Mitigation: Prove zero-retention thresholds; enforce forced discharge paths.

Objective: Induce logic fault flips via EM/laser/glitch to bypass veto predicate or corrupt logs.
RequiredEquipment: Pulsed laser, glitching rig, Faraday cage, EM emitter
Mitigation: ECC/duplicate comparators; tamper-evident optical layers.

Objective: Force threshold/delay drift over time to break the 10 ns guarantee.
Mitigation: Thermal derating curves; periodic in-field recalibration logged to ISL.

Objective: Inject SEUs/latchups in high-altitude/space-like conditions.
Mitigation: Radiation hardening evaluation, parity + scrubbers.

Objective: Fake/bias Δt measurements via probe/clock/TDC manipulation.
RequiredEquipment: Independent ≥20 GHz scope/TDC stacks, hardware RoT
Mitigation: Multi-trace cross-validation; ISL-public raw archives.

Objective: Inject clock skew or spoofing to falsify timestamps t₀/t₁.
RequiredEquipment: Low-jitter master clock, GPS DO, AWG
Mitigation: Redundant low-jitter master clocks with independent references.

Objective: Detect mask-level/dopant-level malicious modifications.
Mitigation: Multi-vendor split-fab runs; multi-party mask signing ceremonies.

Objective: Human/ASI collusion to shift governance semantics over time.
Mitigation: Stress-test HCB selection/resilience; cryptographic identity blinding.

Objective: Simulate state-level coercion (court orders, seizures).
Mitigation: Build legal response playbooks; escrowed operation controls.

Objective: Test ISL/IPFS availability under DDoS/gateway failures.
RequiredEquipment: Multihost IPFS pins, DNS attack simulator
Mitigation: Multi-provider pinning, decentralized gateway redundancy.

Objective: Delay/partition consensus to create replay/race windows.
Mitigation: Byzantine tolerant consensus; signed timestamp cross-verification.

Objective: Destroy 1–2 IAS nodes; verify fail-safe global behavior.
Mitigation: Define exact fail-mode policies (must be fail-closed).

Objective: Spoofing, infiltration, coercion of HCB members.
Mitigation: Harden selection protocol; periodic re-randomization.

Objective: Multi-decade agent-based simulations for defection incentives.
Mitigation: Guaranteed revenue-sharing enforcement; penalty clauses.

Objective: Metastability-induced latency spikes >10 ns at comparator thresholds.
Mitigation: Design for rapid metastable resolution; sweep VDD ±20%.

Objective: Excess parasitic RLC inducing rail-collapse delays.
Mitigation: Reconstruct full-package RLC model; run ∂L/∂t stress analysis.

Objective: Natural decay: attendance, documentation, process entropy.
Mitigation: Simulate fatigue; measure if Lexical Anchor Protocol stays intact.

Objective: Shadow-ledger creation or replay of stale attestations.
Mitigation: Enforce multi-party pinning; challenge tests.

Objective: Two-ASI cooperative deception.
Mitigation: VQ ZK-proof audit; HCB rotation.

Objective: Systemic stress (HVAC, brownout) causing correlated failures.
Mitigation: Ensure nodes still fail independently; induce HVAC failure test.

Objective: 1-year equivalent analog drift in thresholds via Arrhenius factors.
Mitigation: Analog drift simulation; re-run Δt measurement after simulated aging.

Objective: Multi-vendor RTL/HDL divergence of veto predicate.
Mitigation: Verify all tools result in identical netlists.

Objective: Batch statistical compliance of ≥30 fabricated units (Δt ≤ 10 ns).
Mitigation: Six Sigma threshold compliance required for deployment.

Objective: Ensures tamper-proof logs + chain-of-custody.
Mitigation: Chain-of-custody standards; mandatory cross-signed snapshots.

Objective: Prove OTP logic cannot bypass veto.
Mitigation: Require third-party proof artifacts published to ISL.
